name: kafka
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Kafka.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`kafka` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/Mongey/terraform-provider-kafka).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Kafka.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/Mongey/terraform-provider-kafka)
> distributed under [MIT](https://mit-license.org/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-kafka` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-kafka/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-kafka` repo](https://github.com/Mongey/terraform-provider-kafka/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/Mongey/terraform-provider-kafka)
> distributed under [MIT](https://mit-license.org/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-kafka` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-kafka/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-kafka` repo](https://github.com/Mongey/terraform-provider-kafka/issues).

caCert.description: CA certificate file to validate the server's certificate.

caCertFile.description: Path to a CA certificate file to validate the server's certificate.
caCertFile.deprecationMessage: This parameter is now deprecated and will be removed in a later release, please use `ca_cert` instead.

clientCertFile.description: Path to a file containing the client certificate.
clientCertFile.deprecationMessage: This parameter is now deprecated and will be removed in a later release, please use `client_cert` instead.

clientKey.description: The private key that the certificate was issued for.

clientKeyFile.description: Path to a file containing the private key that the certificate was issued for.
clientKeyFile.deprecationMessage: This parameter is now deprecated and will be removed in a later release, please use `client_key` instead.

clientKeyPassphrase.description: The passphrase for the private key that the certificate was issued for.

kafkaVersion.description:
The version of Kafka protocol to use in `$MAJOR.$MINOR.$PATCH` format. Some features may not be available on older
versions. Default is 2.7.0.

saslAwsContainerAuthorizationTokenFile.description: Path to a file containing the AWS pod identity authorization token

saslAwsContainerCredentialsFullUri.description: URI to retrieve AWS credentials from

saslAwsCredsDebug.description: Set this to true to turn AWS credentials debug.

saslAwsRegion.description: AWS region where MSK is deployed.

saslAwsRoleArn.description: Arn of an AWS IAM role to assume

saslAwsToken.description: The AWS session token. Only required if you are using temporary security credentials.

saslMechanism.description: SASL mechanism, can be plain, scram-sha512, scram-sha256, aws-iam

saslTokenUrl.description: The url to retrieve oauth2 tokens from, when using sasl mechanism oauthbearer

skipTlsVerify.description: Set this to true only if the target Kafka server is an insecure development instance.

tlsEnabled.description: Enable communication with the Kafka Cluster over TLS.

provider.description:
The provider type for the kafka package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

aclHost.description:
Host from which principal listed in `acl_principal`
will have access.

aclOperation.description:
Operation that is being allowed or denied. Valid
values are `Unknown`, `Any`, `All`, `Read`, `Write`, `Create`, `Delete`, `Alter`,
`Describe`, `ClusterAction`, `DescribeConfigs`, `AlterConfigs`, `IdempotentWrite`.

aclPermissionType.description:
Type of permission. Valid values are `Unknown`,
`Any`, `Allow`, `Deny`.

aclPrincipal.description: Principal that is being allowed or denied.

aclResourceType.description:
The type of resource. Valid values are `Unknown`,
`Any`, `Topic`, `Group`, `Cluster`, `TransactionalID`.

resourcePatternTypeFilter.description:
The pattern filter. Valid values
are `Prefixed`, `Any`, `Match`, `Literal`. Default `Literal`.

pulumi:providers:kafka/terraformConfig.description: This function returns a Terraform config object with terraform-namecased keys,to be used with the Terraform Module Provider.
